body:
Hello @jbrockmendel! Thanks for updating the PR.



 - In the file [`pandas/core/internals/blocks.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/aa4d7f2c59f11d90ce15107278010a4ffb07812f/pandas/core/internals/blocks.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 666:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/aa4d7f2c59f11d90ce15107278010a4ffb07812f/pandas/core/internals/blocks.py#L666): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 1136:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/aa4d7f2c59f11d90ce15107278010a4ffb07812f/pandas/core/internals/blocks.py#L1136): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 1151:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/aa4d7f2c59f11d90ce15107278010a4ffb07812f/pandas/core/internals/blocks.py#L1151): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 2377:13](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/aa4d7f2c59f11d90ce15107278010a4ffb07812f/pandas/core/internals/blocks.py#L2377): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'
> [Line 3057:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/aa4d7f2c59f11d90ce15107278010a4ffb07812f/pandas/core/internals/blocks.py#L3057): [E722](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E722) do not use bare except'

thanks, ok for now. This needs further splitting (and ultimately everything should be moved out of ``__init__`` to separate modules with minimal dependencies on each other. But I know thats in the plan.
